mapper.select: SELECT v.*, h.*, c.channel_name, c.channel_profile_url FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS rnum, h.video_id FROM History h WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY h.history_id DESC ) AS numbered JOIN Video v ON numbered.video_id = v.video_id JOIN History h ON numbered.video_id = h.video_id JOIN Channel c ON v.channel_id = c.channel_id WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{start} + #{count} - 1 AND h.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER by watch_date desc
SELECT * FROM Video INNER JOIN Channel ON Video.channel_id = Channel.channel_id WHERE Video.video_title LIKE '%${video_title}%' OR Channel.channel_name LIKE '%${video_title}%'
